translation.cvLibraryText: Това е мястото, където можете да управлявате вашата CV Библиотека.
translation.ourMissionText: At Job Portal, our mission is to connect talented individuals with their dream jobs and provide companies with the best candidates. We believe in the power of people and are committed to making the hiring process easier, faster, and more effective for everyone involved.
translation.ourHistoryText: Founded in 2022, Job Portal started with a simple goal: to create a platform where companies and job seekers can connect easily. Over the years, we have grown to become one of the most trusted job platforms, helping thousands of people find their perfect career match and enabling companies to hire top talent efficiently.
translation.blogHeaderText: How to Find Your Dream Job Quickly and Easily

translation.gtcText: At Job Portal, our mission is to connect talented individuals with their dream jobs and provide companies with the best candidates. We believe in the power of people and are committed to making the hiring process easier, faster, and more effective for everyone involved.
translation.historyText: Founded in 2022, Job Portal started with a simple goal: to create a platform where companies and job seekers can connect easily. Over the years, we have grown to become one of the most trusted job platforms, helping thousands of people find their perfect career match and enabling companies to hire top talent efficiently.
